issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Field requires API level 31 (current min is 24): `android.Manifest.permission#BLUETOOTH_SCAN`
Field requires API level 31 (current min is 24): `android.Manifest.permission#BLUETOOTH_CONNECT`
Field requires API level 33 (current min is 24): `android.Manifest.permission#POST_NOTIFICATIONS`
Field requires API level 31 (current min is 24): `android.Manifest.permission#BLUETOOTH_SCAN`
Field requires API level 31 (current min is 24): `android.Manifest.permission#BLUETOOTH_CONNECT`
Field requires API level 33 (current min is 24): `android.Manifest.permission#POST_NOTIFICATIONS`

issue.errorLine1: Log.i("BLEtoMqttService", "Service being destroyed, cleaning up connections");
Log.w("BLEtoMqttService", "Force cleanup called - emergency cleanup in progress");
Log.e("BLEtoMqttService", "Error in force BLE cleanup: " + e.getMessage());
Log.e("BLEtoMqttService", "Error in force MQTT cleanup: " + e.getMessage());
Log.e("BLEtoMqttService", "Error subscribing to MQTT topic: " + e.getMessage());
Log.w(TAG, "Central manager is null or cleaning up, skipping onConnectedPeripheral");
Log.i(TAG, "Added peripheral to tracking list: " + peripheral.getName() + " (" + peripheral.getAddress() + ")");
Log.w(TAG, "Central manager is null or cleaning up, skipping onConnectionFailed");
Log.w(TAG, "Central manager is null or cleaning up, skipping onDisconnectedPeripheral");
Log.i(TAG, "Removed peripheral from tracking list: " + peripheral.getName() + " (" + peripheral.getAddress() + ")");
Log.w(TAG, "Central manager is null or cleaning up, skipping autoConnectPeripheral");
Log.w(TAG, "Central manager is null or cleaning up, skipping onDiscoveredPeripheral");
Log.w(TAG, "Central manager is null or cleaning up, skipping onBluetoothAdapterStateChanged");
Log.w(TAG, "Context is null or cleaning up, skipping onServicesDiscovered");
Log.w("BluetoothHandler", "Central manager is null or cleaning up, skipping scan");
Log.w("BluetoothHandler", "Central manager is null or cleaning up, skipping Publish");
Log.i("BluetoothHandler", "Central manager already null, cleanup skipped");
Log.i("BluetoothHandler", "Found " + connectedPeripherals.size() + " connected peripherals to cleanup");
android.util.Log.w("MQTTHandler", "Context is null or cleaning up, skipping connectComplete");
android.util.Log.w("MQTTHandler", "MQTT connection lost: " + (cause != null ? cause.getMessage() : "Unknown reason"));
android.util.Log.w("MQTTHandler", "Context is null or cleaning up, skipping messageArrived");
android.util.Log.w("MQTTHandler", "MQTT client is null or cleaning up, skipping Publish");
android.util.Log.d("MQTTHandler", "Message published successfully to topic: " + topic);
android.util.Log.w("MQTTHandler", "MQTT client not connected, cannot publish to topic: " + topic);
android.util.Log.e("MQTTHandler", "Error publishing message to topic " + topic + ": " + e.getMessage() + " (Reason code: " + e.getReasonCode() + ")");
android.util.Log.e("MQTTHandler", "Publish timeout detected - server may be overloaded or network issue");
android.util.Log.w("MQTTHandler", "MQTT client is null or cleaning up, skipping Subscribe");
android.util.Log.w("MQTTHandler", "MQTT client not connected, cannot subscribe to topic: " + topicName);
android.util.Log.e("MQTTHandler", "Error subscribing to topic " + topicName + ": " + e.getMessage() + " (Reason code: " + e.getReasonCode() + ")");
android.util.Log.e("MQTTHandler", "Subscribe timeout detected - server may be overloaded or network issue");
android.util.Log.w("MQTTHandler", "MQTT client disconnected, attempting to reconnect...");
android.util.Log.i("MQTTHandler", "Automatic reconnect should be in progress");
android.util.Log.i("MQTTHandler", "MQTT client already null or disconnected, cleanup skipped");

issue.message: Exported service does not require permission
Google Play requires that apps target API level 33 or higher.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `BluetoothCentralManager` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
The resource `R.color.black` appears to be unused
The resource `R.color.white` appears to be unused
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icon used as round icon did not have a circular shape
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
The application adaptive icon is missing a monochrome tag
The application adaptive roundIcon is missing a monochrome tag
